verbs.description: < p > [ARG1: The corporate tax cut] [V: passed] [ARG0: by U.S. President Donald Trump and fellow Republicans] that was in part designed to help dissuade U.S. companies from moving profits overseas may instead make the practice a lot more rewarding.</p >
